login.title: Agent Login
login.subtitle: Hey, Enter your details to get sign in to your account
login.oauthError: OAuth login failed. Please try again.
login.invalidCredentials: Failed to login. Please check your credentials.

signup.subtitleStep1: Join us! Enter your details to create your account
signup.subtitleStep2: Claim your unique spot on Portyo
signup.usernameHint: This will be your public profile URL. You can't change it later !
signup.createError: Failed to create account. Please try again.

forgot.title: Forgot password?
forgot.subtitle: No worries! Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.
forgot.successBody: If an account exists for {{email}}, we've sent a password reset link.
forgot.successHint: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or
forgot.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

verify.title: Check your email
verify.subtitle: We sent a verification code to {{email}}. Please enter the 6-digit code below to verify your account.

resetPassword.invalidDescription: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.
resetPassword.createDescription: Your new password must be different from previously used passwords.
resetPassword.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

claimBio.title: Choose your username
claimBio.subtitle: Claim your unique spot on Portyo
claimBio.urlHint: This will be your public profile URL. You can't change it later!
claimBio.createError: Failed to create your bio. Please try again.
